alert.note: Alert for Ocean (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued February 21 at 4:58PM EST until February 21 at 5:30PM EST by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 530 PM EST FOR EAST CENTRAL OCEAN COUNTY... At 458 PM EST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 9 miles east of Mantoloking to Whiting, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to vehicles is possible. Wind damage to roofs, siding, trees, and power lines is possible. Locations impacted include... Toms River, Beachwood, Seaside Heights, Holiday City-Berkeley, Dover Beaches North, Holiday City South, Pleasant Plains, Pine Ridge At Crestwood, Dover Beaches South, Leisure Village West-Pine Lake Park, South Toms River, Island Heights, Silver Ridge, Gilford Park, Holiday City, Holiday Heights and Crestwood Village. This includes Garden State Parkway between mile markers 75 and 85. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
